TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INativeObject

Docs.summary: A simple interface that is used to expose the unmanaged object pointer in various MonoMac classes.
Docs.remarks: All this interface requires is for a class to expose an IntPtr that points to the unmanaged pointer to the actual object.

Docs.summary: Handle (pointer) to the unmanaged object representation.
Docs.remarks: This IntPtr is a handle to the underlying unmanaged representation for this object.
